Package io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.mod

Class ModX

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.mod.ModX
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LibX, ModXRegistration
    public abstract class ModX
extends java.lang.Object
    A base class for a mod that uses LibX. Is required for many other features of LibX.

      • addSetupTask

        @Deprecated
public final void addSetupTask​(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Deprecated.
        This is deprecated as it should only be used internally.
        This is used internally to add tasks to this mod. THIS SHOULD NOT BE CALLED BY PEOPLE USING THIS LIBRARY. Override setup(FMLCommonSetupEvent) instead. This method might fail in the future if called from outside this library.
